pages.title: Alloy Forgery
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Alloy Forgery$() is an easy way to $(bold)increase ore yield$(). More importantly, it also lets you craft some $(bold)special items$().$(br2)To build a forge, follow the guide shown in the images and combine a $(key)Forge Controller$() with any supported $(key)Forge Body blocks$().
$(key)Forge Body blocks$() are blocks in the multiblock except the controller.

Higher-tier forges are $(bold)faster$(), hold $(bold)more fuel$(), and support $(bold)more recipes$().$(br2)Below lists the required $(key)Forge Controller$() blocks and available $(key)Forge Body blocks$() for each tier:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Tier 1$():$(br)$(list2)$(key)Stone Brick Forge$()$(list3)Stone Brick Forge Controller$(list3)Stone Brick Forge Body:$(list4)Stone Bricks$(list4)Chiseled Stone Bricks

$(list2)$(key)Brick Forge$()$(list3)Brick Forge Controller$(list3)Brick Forge Body:$(list4)Bricks$(br)$(list2)$(key)Deepslate Brick Forge$()$(list3)Deepslate Brick Forge Controller$(list3)Deepslate Brick Forge Body:$(list4)Deepslate Tiles$(list4)Polished Deepslate$(list4)Chiseled Deepslate

$(list)$(bold)Tier 2$():$(br)$(list2)$(key)Prismarine Brick Forge$()$(list3)Prismarine Brick Forge Controller$(list3)Prismarine Brick Forge Body:$(list4)Prismarine Bricks$(br)$(list2)$(key)Polished Blackstone Forge$()$(list3)Polished Blackstone Forge Controller$(list3)Polished Blackstone Forge Body:$(list4)Polished Blackstone$(list4)Polished Blackstone Bricks$(list4)Chiseled Polished Blackstone

$(list)$(bold)Tier 3$():$(br)$(list2)$(key)End Stone Brick Forge$()$(list3)End Stone Brick Forge Controller$(list3)End Stone Brick Forge Body:$(list4)End Stone Bricks$(br)$(list2)$(key)Adamantite Forge$()$(list3)Adamantite Block Forge Controller$(list3)Adamantite Forge Body:$(list4)Block of Adamantite
